charges.charge_description: 18:2117: Breaking and entering U.S. Postal Service motortruck(1)

charges.charge_disposition: committed to custody of BOP for a term of 4 months; 3 years supervised release; $100 special assessment; $3,780 restitution, $3700 joint and several with co-defendants

charges.charge_description: 18:1951, 18:2114(a), 18:2117, 18:1708: By robbery, did obstruct, delay and affect commerce and the movement of articles in commerce, Robbed a person of mail matter, money, and other property of the U.S., Break the seal or lock of a U.S. Postal Service motortruck and vehicle, Mail theft
